professional_summary:
Senior Product Manager with 8+ years building AI-powered, customer-facing products for service-based SMBs and enterprise platforms.
Drove 2.5× adoption, 75% engagement lift, and 50% revenue growth through GenAI roadmaps, LLM integration, and automation workflows.
Expert in cloud, mobile, and data-driven systems with strong product judgment and GTM execution across CRM and decision systems.

work_experience.title: Senior Product Manager
bullets: Drove AI roadmap for cloud-based Dynamic Planning suite serving 10,000+ enterprise users by integrating LLM-powered conversational workflows and predictive ML models across web and Excel.

Led product modernization delivering 2.5× growth in web adoption in 6 months by launching self-service capabilities and reducing workflow setup time 60% through design-partner program with 12 strategic clients.

Owned GTM planning and ML-assisted prioritization using telemetry, embedding scores, and user-behavior clusters to forecast feature ROI and influence product strategy across engineering and executives.
Built LLM agent workflows for autonomous report generation reducing manual effort by 40% through hands-on AI prototyping, model selection, and orchestration for enterprise users.
Delivered data-driven execution by implementing telemetry infrastructure linking product backlogs to success metrics (adoption, conversion, retention) across cloud and mobile platforms.

work_experience.title: Senior Product Manager
bullets: Launched complete Insurance suite for service-based SMBs owning end-to-end product strategy, GTM, and rollout—delivered 75% engagement lift and 50% premium revenue growth in 3 months.

Designed omnichannel contact center workflows for policy inquiries, claims, and renewals across chat and email—architected agent routing, SLAs, and decision systems achieving 75% engagement and 50% revenue growth.
Led cross-functional team of 8 PMs across Insurance, Credit Cards, Fixed Deposits, and Partner Payments—drove product lifecycle execution and alignment for SMB customers.
Scaled partner CRM workflows for 5,000+ B2B partners automating onboarding, payouts, and performance tracking with 100% accuracy—enabling operational efficiency and retention.

work_experience.company: ICICI Prudential Life Insurance Company Limited
work_experience.title: Senior Product Manager
bullets: Launched GPP Retirement Tool achieving 20% category sales growth and Product of the Year recognition by designing ML-powered decision systems, product strategy.
Built NLP-driven conversational voice bot (Alexa) for 500+ agents automating sales insights through intent mapping, agent handoff protocols, and workflow orchestration—reduced reporting time 30%.
Owned ULIP and Annuity portfolio contributing 60% of monthly revenue through product lifecycle management, data-driven feature prioritization.

work_experience.title: Summer Intern
bullets: Analyzed strategic frameworks for SaaS offerings evaluating 256 parameters across competitors—built dynamic dashboard for competitive intelligence enabling data-driven product judgment and vendor selection.

work_experience.title: Software Developer
bullets: Developed full-stack banking application for foreign exchange serving 5 markets—executed frontend, backend integration, testing, and release management demonstrating technical grounding in cloud, web, and APIs.

awards: • Star Employee, Planful (2025) | Top performer recognition
• Star Employee, ICICI Prudential (2021) | Excellence in product delivery
• Product of the Year, ICICI Prudential (2022) | GPP Retirement Tool

education.institution: Jaypee University of Engineering and Technology
